Html:
How do I create a status bar in the mainwindow where all it have is only links to different pages.
I want the status bar in mainwindow and post error/log messages from child windows created using Links. Any help?

For a status bar in the main window you'll need to create a custom window template. I would suggest to use MVVM, create a status view model, bind it to your status control and use messaging to send messages from any view model to the status view model.
